a) Semi-Endogenous Growth
$$\\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= K_t^\\alpha (AL_t)^{1-\\alpha} \\\\
A_t &= K_t^\\phi \\\\
K_{t+1}&= sY_t + (1-\\delta)K_t \\\\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\\\
\\end{aligned}$$

b) Fully Endogenous Growth
$$\\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= AK_t : A = L^{(1- \\alpha)}\\\\
K_{t+1}&= sY_t + (1-\\delta)K_t \\\\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\quad \\text{ where } n = 0 
\\end{aligned}$$
